name: Heroes (SirKnoppix)
description:
This visual novel is currently in development.

Meet Laura Langdon, a thirty-something, career-focused, borderline workaholic, whose personal life has always come in second. She's been alone but not lonely for nearly fifteen years and rarely makes the time for relationships of any kind. She doesn't need anyone and no one needs her and it suits her just fine.

Having always been the hero at work can she manage to play the savior at home for the one person who actually needs her?

Heroes is a visual novel about acceptance and growth. It tells the story of a thirty-something career-focused woman with a non-existent personal life who unwillingly gets thrown into a journey of pain, self-discovery, and healing.

Content warning: Mental Health | Suicide | Language
